00011 SqlServer::SqlServer(QObject* parent)
00012     : QObject(parent)
00013 {
00014     _d.reset(new Aki::SqlServerPrivate(this));
00015     _d->server = Aki::Server::Ptr(new Aki::Server);

00028 bool
00029 SqlServer::operator==(const Aki::SqlServer& rhs) const
00030 {
00031     return (isAutoIdentifyEnabled() == rhs.isAutoIdentifyEnabled() &&
00032             isAutoJoinChannelsEnabled() == rhs.isAutoJoinChannelsEnabled() &&
00033             isAutoReconnectEnabled() == rhs.isAutoReconnectEnabled() &&
00034             isConnectOnStartupEnabled() == rhs.isConnectOnStartupEnabled() &&
00035             isConnectToRandomServerEnabled() == rhs.isConnectToRandomServerEnabled() &&
00036             isDefaultEncodingEnabled() == rhs.isDefaultEncodingEnabled() &&
00037             name() == rhs.name() &&
00038             retryAttemptCount() == rhs.retryAttemptCount() &&
00039             retryInterval() == rhs.retryInterval() &&
00040             serverIdentityId() == rhs.serverIdentityId() &&
00041             serviceName() == rhs.serviceName() &&
00042             servicePassword() == rhs.servicePassword() &&
00043             id() == rhs.id());
00044 }

00046 Aki::SqlServer::List
00047 SqlServer::serversForIdentity(const Aki::SqlIdentity* identity)
00048 {
00049     SqlServer::List list;
00050     QSqlQuery query;
00051     query.prepare(QLatin1String("SELECT * FROM Server WHERE serverIdentity = ?"));
00052     query.addBindValue(identity->id());
00053 
00054     if (!query.exec()) {
00055         Aki::SqlServerPrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00056         return list;
00057     }
00058 
00059     if (query.size() == 0) {
00060         return list;
00061     }
00062 
00063     QSqlRecord record = query.record();
00064     const int id = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("id"));
00065     const int encoding = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("encoding"));
00066     const int autoIdentify = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("autoIdentify"));
00067     const int autoJoinChannels = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("autoJoinChannels"));
00068     const int autoReconnect = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("autoReconnect"));
00069     const int connectOnStartup = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("connectOnStartup"));
00070     const int connectToRandomServer = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("connectToRandomServer"));
00071     const int defaultEncoding = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("defaultEncoding"));
00072     const int name = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("name"));
00073     const int retryAttempts = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("retryAttempts"));
00074     const int retryInterval = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("retryInterval"));
00075     const int serviceName = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("serviceName"));
00076     const int servicePassword = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("servicePassword"));
00077     const int serverIdentity = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("serverIdentity"));
00078 
00079     while (query.next()) {
00080         Aki::SqlServer* server = new Aki::SqlServer;
00081         server->setId(query.value(id).toInt());
00082         server->setEncoding(query.value(encoding).toByteArray());
00083         server->setAutoIdentity(query.value(autoIdentify).toBool());
00084         server->setAutoJoinChannels(query.value(autoJoinChannels).toBool());
00085         server->setAutoReconnect(query.value(autoReconnect).toBool());
00086         server->setConnectOnStartup(query.value(connectOnStartup).toBool());
00087         server->setConnectToRandomServer(query.value(connectToRandomServer).toBool());
00088         server->setDefaultEncoding(query.value(defaultEncoding).toBool());
00089         server->setName(query.value(name).toString());
00090         server->setRetryAttempts(query.value(retryAttempts).toBool());
00091         server->setRetryInterval(query.value(retryInterval).toBool());
00092         server->setServiceName(query.value(serviceName).toString());
00093         server->setServicePassword(query.value(servicePassword).toString());
00094         server->setServerIdentityId(query.value(serverIdentity).toInt());
00095         list.append(server);
00096     }
00097 
00098     return list;
00099 }

00101 Aki::SqlServer*
00102 SqlServer::newServer(const QString& name, const Aki::SqlIdentity* identity)
00103 {
00104     if (name.isEmpty() || name.isNull()) {
00105         return 0;
00106     }
00107 
00108     QSqlQuery query;
00109     query.prepare(QLatin1String("INSERT INTO Server (encoding,autoIdentify,autoJoinChannels,autoReconnect,\n\
00110                                  connectOnStartup,connectToRandomServer,defaultEncoding,name,retryAttempts,retryInterval,\n\
00111                                  serviceName,servicePassword,serverIdentity)\n\
00112                                  VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)"));
00113 
00114     QScopedPointer<Aki::SqlServer> server(new Aki::SqlServer);
00115     server->setAutoIdentity(false);
00116     server->setAutoJoinChannels(false);
00117     server->setAutoReconnect(true);
00118     server->setConnectOnStartup(false);
00119     server->setConnectToRandomServer(false);
00120     server->setDefaultEncoding(true);
00121     server->setEncoding("UTF-8");
00122     server->setName(name);
00123     server->setRetryAttempts(0);
00124     server->setRetryInterval(10);
00125     server->setServiceName(QString());
00126     server->setServicePassword(QString());
00127     server->setServerIdentityId(identity->id());
00128 
00129     query.addBindValue(QString(QLatin1String(server->encoding())));
00130     query.addBindValue(server->isAutoIdentifyEnabled());
00131     query.addBindValue(server->isAutoJoinChannelsEnabled());
00132     query.addBindValue(server->isAutoReconnectEnabled());
00133     query.addBindValue(server->isConnectOnStartupEnabled());
00134     query.addBindValue(server->isConnectToRandomServerEnabled());
00135     query.addBindValue(server->isDefaultEncodingEnabled());
00136     query.addBindValue(server->name());
00137     query.addBindValue(server->retryAttemptCount());
00138     query.addBindValue(server->retryInterval());
00139     query.addBindValue(server->serviceName());
00140     query.addBindValue(server->servicePassword());
00141     query.addBindValue(identity->id());
00142 
00143     if (!query.exec()) {
00144         Aki::SqlServerPrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00145         return 0;
00146     }
00147 
00148     server->setId(query.lastInsertId().toInt());
00149 
00150     return server.take();
00151 }

00159 Aki::SqlServer*
00160 SqlServer::findServer(const QString& name, const Aki::SqlIdentity* identity)
00161 {
00162     if (name.isEmpty() || name.isNull()) {
00163         return 0;
00164     }
00165 
00166     QSqlQuery query;
00167     query.prepare(QLatin1String("SELECT * FROM Server WHERE name=? AND serverIdentity=? LIMIT 1"));
00168     query.addBindValue(name);
00169     query.addBindValue(identity->id());
00170 
00171     if (!query.exec()) {
00172         Aki::SqlServerPrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00173         return 0;
00174     }
00175 
00176     if (query.size() == 0) {
00177         return 0;
00178     }
00179 
00180     QSqlRecord record = query.record();
00181     const int id = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("id"));
00182     const int encoding = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("encoding"));
00183     const int autoIdentify = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("autoIdentify"));
00184     const int autoJoinChannels = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("autoJoinChannels"));
00185     const int autoReconnect = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("autoReconnect"));
00186     const int connectOnStartup = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("connectOnStartup"));
00187     const int connectToRandomServer = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("connectToRandomServer"));
00188     const int defaultEncoding = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("defaultEncoding"));
00189     const int nameIndex = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("name"));
00190     const int retryAttempts = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("retryAttempts"));
00191     const int retryInterval = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("retryInterval"));
00192     const int serviceName = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("serviceName"));
00193     const int servicePassword = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("servicePassword"));
00194     const int serverIdentity = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("serverIdentity"));
00195 
00196     Aki::SqlServer* server = new Aki::SqlServer;
00197     while (query.next()) {
00198         server->setId(query.value(id).toInt());
00199         server->setEncoding(query.value(encoding).toByteArray());
00200         server->setAutoIdentity(query.value(autoIdentify).toBool());
00201         server->setAutoJoinChannels(query.value(autoJoinChannels).toBool());
00202         server->setAutoReconnect(query.value(autoReconnect).toBool());
00203         server->setConnectOnStartup(query.value(connectOnStartup).toBool());
00204         server->setConnectToRandomServer(query.value(connectToRandomServer).toBool());
00205         server->setDefaultEncoding(query.value(defaultEncoding).toBool());
00206         server->setName(query.value(nameIndex).toString());
00207         server->setRetryAttempts(query.value(retryAttempts).toBool());
00208         server->setRetryInterval(query.value(retryInterval).toBool());
00209         server->setServiceName(query.value(serviceName).toString());
00210         server->setServicePassword(query.value(servicePassword).toString());
00211         server->setServerIdentityId(query.value(serverIdentity).toInt());
00212     }
00213 
00214     return server;
00215 }

00378 bool
00379 SqlServer::save()
00380 {
00381     QSqlQuery query;
00382     const QString str = QLatin1String("UPDATE Server SET encoding=?, autoIdentify=?, autoJoinChannels=?,"
00383                                       " autoReconnect=?, connectOnStartup=?, connectToRandomServer=?, defaultEncoding=?,"
00384                                       " name=?, retryAttempts=?, retryInterval=?, serviceName=?, servicePassword=?,"
00385                                       " serverIdentity=? WHERE id=?");
00386     query.prepare(str);
00387     query.addBindValue(QLatin1String(encoding()));
00388     query.addBindValue(isAutoIdentifyEnabled());
00389     query.addBindValue(isAutoJoinChannelsEnabled());
00390     query.addBindValue(isAutoReconnectEnabled());
00391     query.addBindValue(isConnectOnStartupEnabled());
00392     query.addBindValue(isConnectToRandomServerEnabled());
00393     query.addBindValue(isDefaultEncodingEnabled());
00394     query.addBindValue(name());
00395     query.addBindValue(retryAttemptCount());
00396     query.addBindValue(retryInterval());
00397     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlServerPrivate::checkString(serviceName()));
00398     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlServerPrivate::checkString(servicePassword()));
00399     query.addBindValue(serverIdentityId());
00400     query.addBindValue(id());
00401 
00402     if (!query.exec()) {
00403         Aki::SqlServerPrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00404         return false;
00405     }
00406 
00407     return true;
00408 }

00410 bool
00411 SqlServer::remove()
00412 {
00413     QSqlQuery query;
00414     const QString str = QLatin1String("DELETE FROM Server WHERE name=? AND id=?");
00415     query.prepare(str);
00416     query.addBindValue(name());
00417     query.addBindValue(id());
00418 
00419     if (!query.exec()) {
00420         Aki::SqlServerPrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00421         return false;
00422     }
00423 
00424     return true;
00425 }
